title: Well worth seeing.
review: If you are a fan of horror-movies this one is a 'must see'. Good story aswell as acting. If you liked The Conjuring, Insidious, Annabelle you gonna love this one.

title: This movie destroyed my day
review: This movie delivers the worst morality I ever seen. It made me sick and pissed off!

title: Don't watch this movie!
review: I have seen hundreds of horror-movies, and this one takes place on the worst top-10 of them.

title: A big bad mess!
review:
This is one of the most overrated movies on IMDB. Therefore i simply do not trust IMDB anymore when it comes to rating.
This movie is just a gory bad mess of bad acting, bad plot, and ridiculous supernatural entities.
